settings.question: What makes LuxeLine wigs different?
settings.answer: LuxeLine wigs are crafted from 100% premium human hair with HD lace technology for an undetectable, natural appearance. Our glueless designs make installation beginner-friendly while maintaining all-day comfort and security.

settings.question: Are your wigs suitable for beginners?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Our glueless wigs are specifically designed for easy application. No glue, tape, or professional installation required.

settings.question: Can I style my LuxeLine wig?
settings.answer: Yes! Our 100% human hair wigs can be styled just like your natural hair. Use heat protectant and professional products for best results.

settings.question: What is your shipping policy?
settings.answer: We offer free shipping on orders over $200. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the US.

settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.subheading: Everything you need to know about LuxeLine wigs, shipping, and care

settings.heading: Still Have Questions?
settings.subheading: Our customer service team is here to help. Reach out and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
